Body:
"""
        Test that an InvalidMessage error is generated while processing a
        batch with missing batch IDs.
        """
e = engine.KmipEngine()
e._logger = mock.MagicMock()
batch = list([messages.RequestBatchItem(), messages.RequestBatchItem()])
args = batch, None, None
six.assertRaisesRegex(self, exceptions.InvalidMessage,
    'Batch item ID is undefined.', e._process_batch, *args)
